script:
This is a Tier 4 alert for the London metropolitan area. The stock market is trading at impossible speeds. System behavior under investigation.

The derringer's echo never fades. markets trade at impossible speeds.
I bled for this Union. Now it bleeds from within.
Every alert, every failure - my curse made manifest.
Join me in the blood-soaked box seat of history.
Sic semper tyrannis.
